description:
Great on tough muddy trails, the Cloudvista's sole gives you great cushion and grip in rough terrain. Flexible and elastic, its multi-directional responsiveness means you can drive downhill with conviction. The lightweight upper features protective toe-and-heel bumpers to boost your confidence when the trail turns technical.

  • Breathable polyester upper (70% recycled content) provides a secure, locked-in fit
  • Integrated Speedboard® imparts a natural flex, provides energy return and doubles as a rock plate
  • TPU toe cap and mudguard provides protection in high-wear areas
  • Helion™ superfoam and CloudTec® pods compress and stretch upon impact to provide cushioning, improved grip and energy return
  • Missiongrip™ rubber features multiple extruded textures to provide traction exactly where it's needed
name: On Cloudvista Waterproof Trail Running Shoes - Women's
